author: paulhauner
content: Is there an easy way to add a +1 thumb to a comment in Discord? It seems like the shortlist of emoji is expertly crafted to be those I don't use.

author: sky.cactus
content: <@361447803194441738> Either right click on the message and choose "Add reaction" (click on it so you get a more usable dialog with search) or hover over the message and click the little emoji icon that appears on the right.

author: paulhauner
content: <@!301186049323958275>, thanks. That's how I've been doing it but I was hoping there was a method that didn't involve two clicks and some typing.

author: sky.cactus
content: Or if you are on Windows you can press `<windows-key>-<period-key>` to open the universal OS emoji picker.
